compound: SOLNIVERSE is a combination of SOL (Solana) and UNIVERSE.
intro-5: SOLNIVERSE refers to a blockchain payment system that can be used easily anywhere in the world. It is currently available through Phantom Wallet.
intro-6: Don't you have an extension program for Phantom Wallet yet?
